name: Bog Laurel Sachet
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Objective Category.
flavor: "A palm-sized hand sewn sachet filled with dry leaves. Releases a faint tea-like aroma."

name: Fresh Bog Laurel
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Objective Category.
flavor: "A beautiful purple flower that grows in the midst of the tainted swamp. Releases a mild tea-like aroma."

name: Fragrant Bog Laurel
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Objective Category.
flavor: "A beautiful purple flower that grows in the midst of the tainted swamp. Releases a strong tea-like aroma."

name: Crispleaf Amaranth Sachet
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Survival Category.

name: Fresh Crispleaf Amaranth
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Survival Category.

name: Fragrant Crispleaf Amaranth
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Survival Category.

name: Primrose Blossom Sachet
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Altruism Category.
flavor: "A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet containing 4 gold pultetals. The primrose opens at the very last moment before the sun gives place to the night."

name: Fresh Primrose Blossom
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Altruism Category.
flavor: "Golden flowers harvested at their peak. The primrose opens at the very last moment before the sun gives place to the night."

name: Fragrant Primrose Blossom
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Altruism Category.

name: Sweet William Sachet
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Boldness Category.
flavor: "A palm-sized hand-swen sachet containing a mix of pale petals and glaucous bluish leaves. Releases a strong spicy, cove-like scent."

name: Fresh Sweet William
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Boldness Category.
flavor: "A bunch of flowers with pink petals and a blood red core. Releases a spicy, clove-like scent."

name: Fresh Sweet William
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Boldness Category.
flavor: "A bunch of flowers with pink petals and a blood red core. Releases a strong spicy, clove-lick scent."

name: Bound Envelope
description: Grants %b25%/b% bonus bloodpoints in all Categories to all survivors.
flavor: "An opened envelope re-sealed and bound with 4 coloured ribbons."

name: Sealed Envelope
description: Grants %b25%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in all Categories.
flavor: "An unaddressed and unopened envelope yellowed by its time. Its message will never be known."

name: Escape Cake
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in all Categories.
flavor: "This picture of a cake sure is real."

name: Chalk Pouch
description: %bSlightly increases%/b Luck.
flavor: "A small cotton pouch filled with white chalky powder of unknown origin. Some believe it brings good fortune."

name: Cream Chalk Pouch
description: %bModerately increases%/b Luck.
flavor: "A small cotton pouch half-filled with a cream coloured chalky powder of unknown origin. Releases a faint herbal aroma. Some believe it brings good fortune."

name: Ivory Chalk Pouch
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b Luck.
flavor: "A small leather pouch displaying a straight white line hand-sewn on one of its sides. The bag is filled with an ivory chalky powder that shines under the moonlight. Some believe it brings good fortune."

name: Salt Pouch
description: %bSlightly increases%/b Luck of all Survivors.
flavor: "A small cotton pouch filled with black salt crystals. Some believe it brings good fortune. Don't spill it."

name: Vigo's Jar of Salty Lips
description: %bConsiderably increases%/b Luck of all Survivors.
flavor: "A tightly sealed glass jar containing torn human lips floating in a murky brine. Some believe it brings good fortune."

name: Tarnished Coin
description: Calls on the Entity to create %b1%/b more Chest.
flavor: "A round piece of metal which has lost all sheen."

name: Shiny Coin
description: Calls on the Entity to create %b2%/b more Chests.
flavor: "A clean and polished piece of gold."

name: Petrified Oak
description: Calms The Entity and prevents %b1%/b Hook from appearing.
flavor: "A deteriorating piece of petrified wood."

name: Shroud of Union
description: You start the trial with someone else.
flavor: "A knotted piece of fabric."

name: Shroud of Binding
description: All Survivors start the trial together.
flavor: "A square and washed out piece of fabric with small knots on each end."

name: Vigo's Shroud
description: You start the trial as far away as possible from the Killer.
flavor: "I found marvels through the years in the fog, but only now do I understand how to bend the fog's irrefragable rules." -Vigo's Journal
